level.heading: Certificates of compliance.
level.text: ยง28-118.11 Certificates of compliance. No certificate of occupancy shall be issued until certificates of compliance are issued for the following types of service equipment: 1. Air conditioning and ventilation systems. 2. Elevators, escalators, moving walkways and dumbwaiters. 3. Fuel burning and fuel oil storage equipment. 4. Refrigeration systems. 5. Heating systems. 6. Boilers.
